short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A virtual pet in the browser sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring Adorable Companions to Your Desktop
Ever dreamed of having a cute, pixelated pet right on your screen? With Virtual Pet, you can enjoy the company of charming 16-bit style animals that roam and play in your extension!

Features:
Diverse Pets: Choose from a variety of adorable pets, including a guinea pig, an owl, a cat, a dog, and more! Each pet is lovingly designed in a nostalgic 16-bit style.
Interactive Fun: Watch your pet move randomly across your screen. Click on them to make them jump, or drag them around with your mouse. They respond to your interactions just like a real pet!
Customization: Easily change your pet's name to whatever you like. Have a new favorite pet? Switch between different pets with a simple click.
Persistent Companionship: Your pet's data is saved even when you close the application. Pick up right where you left off with your lovable companion.
Convenient Menu: Access all the features from a sleek, intuitive dropdown menu. Change pets, rename them, or reset your data effortlessly.
